alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County; Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Spokane Area; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued December 15 at 11:32PM PST until December 18 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Stagnant conditions will have potential to trap pollutants near the ground with deteriorated air quality. * WHERE...Orin-Rice Road, Waterville, Inchelium, Wenatchee, Colville, Flowery Trail Road, Fruitland, Boulder Creek Road, Conconully, Disautel Pass, Springdale-Hunters Road, Methow, Republic, Chewelah, Sherman Pass, Rockford, Stevens Pass, Okanogan, Northport, Mazama, Airway Heights, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Chelan, Ione, Wauconda, Omak, Leavenworth, Downtown Spokane, Brewster, Holden Village, Nespelem, Tonasket, Cashmere, Tiger, Number 2 Canyon, Twisp, Plain, Oroville, Kettle Falls, Mansfield, Pangborn Airport, Deer Park, Winthrop, Loup Loup Pass, Davenport, Spokane Valley, Metaline Falls, Badger Mountain Road, Number 1 Canyon, Cheney, Stehekin, Fairfield, Bridgeport, Newport, Metaline, Chesaw Road, and Entiat. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Periods of air stagnation can lead to the buildup of pollutants near the surface.
info.instruction: Buildup of fine pollution particles can be harmful to those sensitive to air pollution including people with lung and heart problems, people with diabetes, children and the elderly.

area.areaDesc: Central Chelan County; Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley; Spokane Area; Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area; Western Chelan County; Western Okanogan County
